entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 21 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then clearing. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 21 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 30.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
